duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepares and/or pre-portions food for regular and therapeutic diets according to the planned menu and production sheets.
Handles food using proper food handling and food safety techniques according to established policies and procedures.
Ensures that food is served in an attractive, appetizing manner and maintains the proper temperature of food during preparation and service.
Assists with the setup of the tray line and assembles trays according to the planned menu and tray tickets, resident food preferences, and diet order.
Assists in checking trays during service for accuracy.
